nodes.text: "The Jabba Tape" is a Star Wars Legends comic serial that was written by John Wagner, illustrated by Kilian Plunkett, and published in the Topps magazines Star Wars Galaxy Magazine 13 and Star Wars Galaxy Collector, issues 1–3. The story was later collected in the one-shot comic book Star Wars: The Jabba Tape, which was published by Dark Horse Comics in 1998.
